entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Tillsonburg

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
